funLines: Bug-free code? Sure, in another dimension.
Debugging: Where dreams go to die.
Pi’s infinite. Just like my mistakes.
Code is the illusion of order.
Code is art, if it compiles.
Existence: An infinite loop of uncertainty.

about.title: About Me
about.content: As a results-driven Backend Developer, I specialize in architecting and delivering high-performance, scalable web applications. With deep expertise in Laravel and other modern frameworks, I have a proven track record of engineering solutions from enterprise-grade ERPs to AI-powered platforms. I am passionate about rapid development and creative problem-solving, and while my focus is the backend, I am also proficient with frontend and mobile technologies, allowing me to contribute effectively across the full stack.

projects.name: DevPay - Payment Gateway
projects.description: Engineered a comprehensive payment gateway prototype using Next.js and Supabase to simulate a complete financial ecosystem. This project features detailed API documentation and includes dedicated dashboards for Admins, Merchants, and Government Agents, showcasing my ability to design and build complex, multi-tenant systems with a focus on security and usability.

projects.name: Palmisland - Dubai Property Agency
projects.description: Developed an agency website for showcasing luxury properties in Dubai. The platform is built with a Laravel backend and React.js frontend, designed to provide an elegant and responsive user experience for property listings and client interactions.

projects.name: Ma3rood - E-commerce, Property & Motors Platform
projects.description: Built a comprehensive multi-category marketplace inspired by TradeMe (New Zealand) and tailored for the Dubai market. Ma3rood offers a full-fledged e-commerce system, property listings, and motors marketplace, providing users with a seamless platform to buy, sell, and explore diverse categories in one unified ecosystem.

projects.name: Ride_n_Share - Real-Time Ride Booking App
projects.description: Contributed to the development of a ride-booking mobile application with a Nest.js backend and React Native frontend. Specifically implemented WebSocket-based live communication to enable real-time ride requests, driver updates, and user notifications. This project demonstrates my ability to design and integrate scalable, low-latency communication systems within mobile applications, ensuring a smooth and interactive user experience.

projects.name: GetX Services - On-Demand Services App
projects.description: Developed a full-featured mobile marketplace for on-demand home services using Flutter and a NestJS backend. This comprehensive solution supports dual roles for users and service providers, and integrates Firebase for real-time notifications, showcasing my ability to build robust, cross-platform mobile applications from the ground up.

projects.name: Portfolio OS
projects.description: The very operating system you are using now. A creative and interactive portfolio built to simulate a Kali Linux desktop environment. This project demonstrates my frontend skills and attention to detail, using Next.js, TypeScript, and Framer Motion to create a unique user experience.

experience.description: Architect and develop scalable backend systems using Laravel and Nest.js, with expertise in designing and maintaining APIs. Focused on building secure, efficient, and high-performance applications through strong database management, real-time communication, and optimized system architecture.

education.description: Enrolled in an intensive program covering a wide range of software development principles, tools, and technologies.

education.institution: Govet Degree Boys Colledge Gulistan-e-johar block 7
education.description: Completed intermediate studies with a focus in Pre-Engineering.
Completed matriculation with a focus in Biology.
